text: Countess Marisa Allasio (born Maria Luisa Lucia Allasio; 14 July 1934) is a retired Italian actress. She appeared in nearly 20 movies between 1952 and 1957.Maria Allasio . glamourgirlsofthesilverscreen.com She was born in Turin, Piedmont. She retired from acting in 1957 after marrying Count Pier Francesco Calvi di Bergolo.Come Marisa Allasio. corriere.it. 18 March 2008 Allasio was known for her lead role in Dino Risi's comedy Poveri ma belli in 1957. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Italian movie actors Category:People from Turin
